function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within the built environment","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing protocols, clear communication of guidelines","Technologies":"Digital tracking systems, occupancy monitoring sensors","People":"Building occupants, visitors, employees","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate infection prevention measures","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission through contact and airborne routes","Mitigation":"Education on hygiene practices, provision of sanitization resources","Technologies":"Touchless fixtures, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, cleaning crew","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning contractors"},{"Description":"Lack of compliance with lockdown procedures","Impact":"Increased probability of community transmission within the built environment","Mitigation":"Strong communication on lockdown guidelines, enforcement of restrictions","Technologies":"Access control systems, remote work tools","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Public health authorities, building management"}]}
